Package
Description
org.springframework.test.web.servlet.client
Support for testing Spring MVC applications via RestTestClient with MockMvc for server request handling.

    MockMvcWebTestClient.RouterFunctionSpec
    Specification for configuring MockMvc to test one or more router functions directly, and a simple facade around RouterFunctionMockMvcBuilder.
